title: Is Laura Phelps the crisis actress who lost a child in Sandy Hawk and Mariory Stoneman Douglas?
subtitle: The conspiracy theory accusing Nick and Laura Phillips of being "crisis actors" received a new (and false) distortion following the shooting at Parkland School, Florida.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Laura Phelps is the representative of the crises that lost children during the shooting at the school at Sandy Hawk Elementary School in 2012 and Mariori Stoneman Douglas High School in 2018.
